short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to test api calls and stackoverflow search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

-User Friendly UI
-Api Testing
-Easy Error search on Stack overflow

This is essentially built to increase productivity in frontend development. Made for developers, it lets users  find API response.
It includes JSON formatter, and JSON viewer to better visualize data in collapsible form.
